title: Xrobot Sweeper
description: This is an one-stop management platform for artificial intelligence device of XRobot, it can be used for control of XRobot floor cleaning robot, providing online real-time view of the track, setting up restricted areas and cleaning areas, spot cleaning, scheduled cleaning, etc. Unlock more amazing features, all in Xrobot Sweeper.You can get simple operation, convenient interaction and excellent experience indeed.
descriptionHTML: This is an one-stop management platform for artificial intelligence device of XRobot, it can be used for control of XRobot floor cleaning robot, providing online real-time view of the track, setting up restricted areas and cleaning areas, spot cleaning, scheduled cleaning, etc. Unlock more amazing features, all in Xrobot Sweeper.You can get simple operation, convenient interaction and excellent experience indeed.
